title: Rhys Shellard
text:
Rhys Shellard (born 25 June 1985) is a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player for <a href="Cardiff%20RFC">Cardiff RFC</a> and <a href="Cardiff%20Blues">Cardiff Blues</a> in the <a href="Pro14">Celtic League</a>. He previously played with <a href="Aberdare%20RFC">Aberdare RFC</a> and most notably, <a href="Pontypridd%20RFC">Pontypridd RFC</a>. At The end of the 2007–08 season Shellard left the Blues. Shellard's position of choice is as a back-row forward.
Rhys Shellard returned to Pontypridd for the 2012-2013 campaign.
He was selected in the <a href="Wales%20national%20rugby%20sevens%20team">Wales Sevens squad</a> for 2012-13
